comment: Due to COVID-19, ES2200 Maymester was switched to online, which prob made it way easier! Four quizzes, 3 exams, one discussion, one written scenario worksheet. You could easily finish the whole class in one day. No lockdown browser, even she suggests to use the e-books while you are taking the quizzes and exams. No class meetings online either!

Took this over the summer as a Maymester. Although it says 4days/wk for 2 weeks we only met 3 days in total. She is very nice and caring. Makes the class feel comfortable. Highly recommend taking in summer because it is so easy. Can't imagine this class taking a whole semester. Only a handful of assignments and easy grader.

Super easy class. 1 quiz and 1 Assignment per week, total of 15 chapters . Everything is preloaded on D2L so you can work ahead. I finished the whole class in the first month. You need the book. 2 tests (1 midterm,1 final 100 Questions each). Cant say much about the teacher, you barely interact with her.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Clear grading criteria

comment: She is very passionate on what she teaches. She's very credible and knows her stuff. I think her class structure and organization could be better, but coaching swimming is life so I understand. As long as you do the assignments and you do not procrastinate, this class is an easy A. Make sure that you come to scenario day prepared and you'll be okay
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: I have had to email this professor multiple times because she puts in my grades incorrectly, and she is so slow to respond. I received an A in this class and it is very easy. However, I can't tell if shes being stubborn or geniuenly cannot calculate grades properly. Be forewarned this class is easy, but shes a very stubborn/slow grader.
Super easy class. I never went. 99.9% of the assignments are online. There's one assignment we did in class. Easy A you won't regret the easy gen ed.

Seems like a lot of work, but it's not. This is a super easy class. It's not mandatory to go, although she does take attendance. Tests are online but some are difficult. The projects are soooo easy. Just pay attention to due dates and you will get an A.
Super easy if you take it over the summer. Show her you're trying and do the Extra Credit and you have an A.... Other than that... You're fine. EASY A

Tests are from powerpoints and online. Gives extra credit opportunities. Save everything so if there's a question about a grade, if you show her you did it she'll change your grade. Doesn't take late work. Only counts 3 exams so if you're happy with your grade before the final you don't have to take it. Class is kind of boring but mandatory. Easy A
Tests are pretty much the questions on the internet so it's very easy to get an A. She's not strict in regards to phone or computer usage or people taking naps in class.

Well I actually have 2 classes with her. She is so disorganized and her grading isn't fair. Once she decides what grade you deserve you cannot get any higher than it no matter what you do. She also cannot remember a thing. She forgot to tell half the class that there was going to be a test one time.

She is an absolute health nut who spends most of the class bragging about how fit she is and, even though she's already tiny, complaining about how she wants to look like all her skinny friends. Lectures are word-for-word from the text. I highly recommend you choose someone else who isn't as self-absorbed so you might actually learn something.
